page.title: 12RECREATION IN FORFAR
page.content: {Recreation}Forfar Athletic{Football} Club are in Division 1 this year and were 2nd Division Champions last season.They play at Station Park up by Market St.The ground holds around 800 people and the stand has wooden seats. We are very proud to have a 1st Division team in Forfar which is one of the oldest established clubs in Scotland.Their manager is Doug Houston and their longest serving player is Alex Brash who has been with the club for 10 years.{Sports}In the town we have a Rugby and Cricket Club.The Rugby Club play on Inchmacoble Park.It opened in 1933 on the south of the Loch.On the other side of the Loch we have a Sailing Club on Queen Margaret's Inch.We have a number of Bowling Clubs in town.One is in the Reid Park and another on Lour Road.
